directions: Heat oven to broil (medium broil if your oven has low/med/high)
Generously coat each side of the lamb steak with the rosemary, oregano and garlic.
Sprinkle with desired amount of salt and pepper.
Place on a broiling pan and broil 3-4 minutes each side (4 minutes each side should give you a medium steak).
ingredients: 1.5 lb Bone-in Leg of Lamb Steak — the butcher near me sells it in steak form (not as the whole leg). If your doesn’t you can ask them to cut it for you.
2 tbsp fresh or dried rosemary, chopped
title: Rosemary Lamb Leg Steak
